detail_desc: Straight-cut blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long, wide sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.

Thin jacket in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs. Chest pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide jumper in a knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Long jacket in a sturdy cotton weave with hand-embroidered stitching, lapels, a wrapover with a narrow tie, side pockets and high slits in the sides.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft, fine knit with short sleeves and elasticated smocking at the top. Unlined.
